title: Classic Table Tennis & Rec Room Sports
description: Paddle through memories of table tennis, ping pong, and other beloved rec room sports from the golden era of home entertainment!

Which billiards game, also popular in rec rooms, involves sinking balls numbered 1 through 9 in order?
